description: [AvosLocker](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1053) has enumerated shared drives on a compromised network.(Citation: Malwarebytes AvosLocker Jul 2021)(Citation: Joint CSA AvosLocker Mar 2022)

external_references.description: FBI, FinCEN, Treasury. (2022, March 17). Indicators of Compromise Associated with AvosLocker Ransomware. Retrieved January 11, 2023.
Hasherezade. (2021, July 23). AvosLocker enters the ransomware scene, asks for partners. Retrieved January 11, 2023.
